item.description:
Hi All,

A few of us are running this event on Saturday and it may be of interest to anyone looking for a longer race as part of training for autumn marathons etc.

Plus it's a bargain at only $20!!!

http://www.runreg.com...

Please indicate whether you are willing to carpool anyone from Boston or are looking for a ride.

Any questions then please let me know!

Take care... Martin

p.s. you're responsible for signing up, safety etc. etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organised Race... The "Charming" Cape Cod Canal 14 Mile Race
